LanguageData.DarkConcrete.label: Dark Concrete
LanguageData.DarkConcrete.description: Dark concrete in a honeycomb pattern. You'll need to be able to dig out the ground to pour this.
LanguageData.CeramicTile.label: Ceramic Tile
LanguageData.CeramicTile.description: Small white ceramic tiles with a dark bordering. Quick to move around on.
